channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 16:47 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creck on further messages.

item.title: 🟡 13:56 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_.
